item.title: CVE-2024-24931|2024-06-04T17:42:53.625Z -- swadeshswain -- before%20after%20image%20slider%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in swadeshswain Before After Image Slider WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Before After Image Slider WP: from n/a through 2.2.
